nimeshge wasana mahimayen ithaliye jathika krikat kandayame samajikayeku washayen theripath wanne jiwithaye saradamakata meni,ehidi ohu ithaliye pasal sewanedi hadi wademin, ithaliye jathika kandayame tharuwak wuwath,kandayame sanchara waladi prathipadana wen kirima sochchamak hethuwen,pasal waraya atharathurath,haki sama awasthawedimath midi wathuwala midi kada mudal ekathukirimatath, haki hama witama demapiyanata karadarayak nowi kuli wada karamin krikat kridawata saha awashya sanchara walata mudal soyaganimen jiwithaye jaya ganmata para soyagena katuka mawathaka gamangath pudgalayaku bawa thorathuru aaranchi marga sandahan karayi.

ranil landanayedi koti dayasporawa samanga bara kathawakael.ti.ti.ee. sanwidhanaya thrasthawadi sanwidhana layisthuwen iwath karana lesa yuropa sangamayata niyoga karana thinduwak yuropa sangam adhikaranaya mangin pasugiyada prakashayata path kara thibini.me thinduwath samanga thrasthawadayata erehiwa siyalu ratawal nangi sitiya yuthu bawata amerikawa geniyana wadapiliwelata erehiwa abhiyogayak ella wanne ya.koti sanwidhanaya yanu mulu lowama hela dakina lada athi bhayanaka thrasthawadi sanwidhanayaki.

kohomin hari kuweni panala yanawa kurunagala paththe thiyena hachchi kuchchi kiyana paththata.ehe gihin ehe jiwath wenawa.ethakota wijaya thamunta kiyala bisawak gennagannawa dakunu indiyawen .ayage nama wijayi.wijaya awata pradesha wala palana balaya allagena wijayi kumariyawath wiwaha karagena lankawe palana balaya alla gannawa.me kalaye kuweni nawathath thamnge sahodara pirisa inna sirasawasthupurayata yanawa .ehema yanakota thamunge kulayata wirudda unu nisa ayata gal mul walin pahara denawa..eekata ayata tharaha athiwenne ara wijayi kumariyath ekka.ee tharahata kuweni ayage manthra shakthiyen gonek ewanawa wijayi kumariyawa maranna..eeth kuwenima kiyadunnu manthara shakthiyen wijaya ee gonawa maranayata pathkaranawa..ee wade hari giya nathinisa nawathath kuwenima enawa wijayiwa maranna .ee wenakota wijayata meka danila wijayiwa gal kuharayaka dala kaduwak athin gaththu ayek aarakshawata yodala innawa.kuweni wijayiwa maranna aawata eyata ayata lanwenna labenne na.anna ee nisa gal kutiraye yathur hilen diwa damma kiyanawa.ee para ara murakaru kadupaharak dila thiyanwa diwa kapenna.eeta passe kuweni lathoni digena gihin thiyanawa aayeth hachchi kuchchi kiyana pradeshayata.ee pradeshaye galak uda indan lathoni dila thiyanwa..kuweni lathoni dunnu gala adatath thonigala kiyala handunwanne ethanin passeyi.me galin panala kuweni an thimata marenawa.ethaninuyi lankawe kuweni ge kathandare iwara wenne..
es ti ef ekatath wedi thiyanawa nam awashesha janaya gana kawara kathada?
naha, ban, pissuda.
saman dewidunge adawiye haskam anunaya.
ayiyage kathawedi kondostharage paththeth waradak thiyenawa thama..
mata ambanaka baninawa !
mona malakaradarayakda manda kiya kiya thamayi mama giye.

janadhipathiwaranaye di shri la ni pakshaye ha sandhanaye apekshakayata wiruddhawa tharaga kara maha mathiwaranaye di sandhanayata ha pakshayata erehiwa katayuthu kara ohu ada kathakaranne katin da yana prashnaya mathuwuwath ude ekak kiya dawal wenath ekak kiya sawasa thama ese kiwe dayi asana sirisena mahathata paudgalika karunu wada wadagath wana bawa api danimu.
samanyayen oona ma kshethrayaka athi wana susamadarshiya wenasaka di sidu wanne, ema wenasa parannange nosathutatath, tharunayange aakarshanayatath lak wima ya.
eeth kawuruwath ganan ganne na.
api me uthsaha karanne me ralla idiriyata enna nodi pasu pasata ganna wadapiliwelak kriyathmaka karana ekayi.
ee lassana hada, mawa jiwath karana hada ahanne nathuwa inne komada?
